original_title: Man arrested with nearly 2 kgs of heroin in Panadura
original_body_lines: Colombo, May 26 (Daily Mirror)- A 37-year-old man was arrested with 1.850 kilograms of heroin at Walapana in the Panadura South police division this evening.
The raid was carried out by the Kalutara Crimes Division on information received by them. A mobile phone was also taken into police custody.
